1370: Daniel moved to Cromme straet.D.3 after marriage.
Got married to Godeweris at age 29 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Godeweris, Amalburga, at age 29.
1371: Had a daughter with Godeweris, Leanne, at age 30.
1372: Had a son with Godeweris, Conzone, at age 31.
Lost son Conzone when Conzone was 1 years old.
1374: Had a daughter with Godeweris, Eingeliadis, at age 33.
1376: Lost daughter Eingeliadis when Eingeliadis was 3 years old.
1377: Lost son Duker when Duker was 0 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Lost his wife Godeweris and their son Duker  while Godeweris was giving birth when he was 36.
Became caretaker of Amalburga, Leanne at age 37.
